title: The Force Awakens
description:
To celebrate the release of the first new Star Wars movie in over a decade, Disney and Google came together as one. From this partnership blossomed a brand campaign reaching across all of Google's properties, including Search, Gmail, Translate, and Maps. To top it off, we made an interactive dual screen experience that turned your phone into a lightsaber, letting you battle the villainous Stormtroopers.

While part of my work included conceptualizing product integrations, I largely focused on designing the user experience for the interactive web game, including interfaces, interaction, and models of gameflow, with consideration of the technical limitations imposed by mobile sensors and latency. The final product truly pushed contemporary technologies to their limit and garnered over 700 million media impressions in the first 24 hours.
